desc: We are working on rebranding and restocking our store. Follow us on TikTok, Facebook, and Instagram (Glossy Boss LLC). Restock date June 20th !

layout.text: Glossy Boss LLC is a black, woman owned brand we are located in Atlanta, Georgia. Glossy Boss, is where our goals is to value natural, resourceful self care products. We are dedicated to help all women with self-love, self care and to also help embrace your natural beauty. We are committed to provide you with the best high-quality 100% all natural skin Care products.
